mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (b_no, b_title, b_content, user_id, re_group) values (seq_board_bno.nextval, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{user_id}, seq_board_bno.nextval)
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select b.*, nvl(c.cnt, 0) comment_cnt from tbl_board b, (select b_no, count(*) cnt from tbl_comment group by b_no) c where b.b_no = c.b_no(+)
order by re_group desc, re_seq asc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
